name: Number Solitaire
description:
Enjoy this brain training game at home or at work, at a park or in a bus, in other words everywhere!

The goal is to arrange the cards into four column (suits) ordered from top to bottom, Ace through King. You have 4 wild cards to exchange. Less time will get higher ranking!

How to play:
• Ace can exchange with wild card at top 1 row;
• King can exchange with wild card at the bottom row. No cards can be placed to the bottom of King;
• A wild card can be filled by the next value of the same color as the number to its top. eg. Heart 8 can be exchange with wild card when top is Heart 7 or bottom is Heart 9;
• Use shuffle to reorder the cards, no worry that ordered cards will not be shuffled;

Any questions, please feel free to contact us azhuona@gmail.com
